title: Vermes
body: Four terrestrial worms, says Johnson, have been identified in Madeira, including the earthworm. As for marine worms, more than 240 species are known, collected by Professor P. Langerhans. The new species were well illustrated by this naturalist in the *Zeitschrift f√ºr wissenchaftliche Zoologie* (1879-1884). The largest and most beautiful of the marine worms of Madeira is the *Amphinome carunculata*, a species provided with stinging bristles.

Johnson: Author who identified four terrestrial worms in Madeira
P. Langerhans: Professor who collected over 240 species of marine worms in Madeira

1879: Illustration of the new species of marine worms by the naturalist P. Langerhans
